== Title ==

Rigid and affine registration

== Description ==

This program performs rigid and affine image registration using multi-resolution optimization of voxel-based image similarity measures.

== Syntax ==

: <tt>[options] ReferenceImage FloatingImage </tt>

where

; <tt>ReferenceImage</tt> : Reference (fixed) image path

; <tt>FloatingImage</tt> : Floating (moving) image path

== List of Supported Options ==

=== Global Toolkit Options ===

; <tt>--verbose-level</tt> <tt><integer></tt> : Set verbosity level.

; <tt>--verbose</tt> / <tt>-v</tt> : Increment verbosity level by 1.

; <tt>--threads</tt> <tt><integer></tt> : Increment verbosity level by 1.

=== Automation Options ===

; <tt>--auto-multi-levels</tt> <tt><integer></tt> : Automatic optimization and resolution parameter generation for <n> levels '''[Default value: 0]'''

=== Optimization settings ===

; <tt>--exploration</tt> <tt><double></tt> / <tt>-e</tt> <tt><double></tt> : Exploration [initial optimizer step size] '''[Default value: 8]'''

; <tt>--accuracy</tt> <tt><double></tt> / <tt>-a</tt> <tt><double></tt> : Accuracy [final optimizer step size] '''[Default value: 0.1]'''

; <tt>--stepfactor</tt> <tt><double></tt> / <tt>-f</tt> <tt><double></tt> : Factor for search step size reduction. Must be > 0.0 and < 1.0 '''[Default value: 0.5]'''

; <tt>--delta-f-threshold</tt> <tt><double></tt> : Optional threshold to terminate optimization (level) if relative change of target function drops below this value. '''[Default value: 0]'''

=== Image resolution parameters ===

; <tt>--sampling</tt> <tt><double></tt> / <tt>-s</tt> <tt><double></tt> : Image sampling (finest resampled image resolution) '''[Default value: 1]'''

; <tt>--coarsest</tt> <tt><double></tt> : Upper limit for image sampling in multiresolution hierarchy '''[Default value: -1]'''

; <tt>--omit-original-data</tt> : Do not use original data in full resolution, omit final stage in multiresolution hierarchy, thus reducing computation time.

=== Transformation parameters ===

; <tt>--dofs</tt> <tt><integer>[,<integer>,...]</tt> : Add number of degrees of freedom [can be repeated]

; <tt>--dofs-final</tt> <tt><integer>[,<integer>,...]</tt> : Add number of degrees of freedom for final level only [can be repeated]

; <tt>--no-switch</tt> / <tt>-n</tt> : Do not auto-switch reference and floating image for improved computational performance

; <tt>--initxlate</tt> / <tt>-i</tt> : Initialized transformation by translating floating image FOV center onto reference image FOV center

; <tt>--initial</tt> <tt><transformation-path></tt> : Initialize transformation from given path '''[Default value: NONE]'''

; <tt>--initial-is-inverse</tt> : Invert initial transformation before initializing registration

=== Image data ===

; <tt>--registration-metric</tt> : Registration metric for motion estimation by image-to-image registration.Supported values: "<tt>nmi</tt>", "<tt>mi</tt>", "<tt>cr</tt>", "<tt>msd</tt>", "<tt>ncc</tt>", where the default is "nmi", or use one of the following
:; <tt>--nmi</tt> : Normalized Mutual Information metric '''[This is the default]'''
:; <tt>--mi</tt> : Standard Mutual Information metric
:; <tt>--cr</tt> : Correlation Ratio metric
:; <tt>--msd</tt> : Mean Squared Difference metric
:; <tt>--ncc</tt> : Normalized Cross Correlation metric

; <tt>--match-histograms</tt> : Match floating image histogram to reference image histogram.

=== Reference Image Preprocessing ===

; <tt>--class-ref</tt> <tt><string></tt> : Data class: grey (default) or label '''[Default value: NONE]'''

; <tt>--pad-ref</tt> <tt><double></tt> : Padding value '''[Default: disabled]'''

; <tt>--thresh-min-ref</tt> <tt><double></tt> : Minimum value truncation threshold '''[Default: disabled]'''

; <tt>--thresh-max-ref</tt> <tt><double></tt> : Maximum value truncation threshold '''[Default: disabled]'''

; <tt>--prune-histogram-ref</tt> <tt><integer></tt> : Number of bins for histogram-based pruning '''[Default: disabled]'''

; <tt>--histogram-equalization-ref</tt> : Apply histogram equalization

; <tt>--sobel-filter-ref</tt> : Apply Sobel edge detection filter

; <tt>--crop-index-ref</tt> <tt><string></tt> : Cropping region in pixel index coordinates [parsed as %d,%d,%d,%d,%d,%d for i0,j0,k0,i1,j1,k1] '''[Default value: NONE]'''

; <tt>--crop-world-ref</tt> <tt><string></tt> : Cropping region in world coordinates [parsed as %f,%f,%f,%f,%f,%f for x0,y0,z0,x1,y1,z1] '''[Default value: NONE]'''

=== Floating Image Preprocessing ===

; <tt>--class-flt</tt> <tt><string></tt> : Data class: grey (default) or label '''[Default value: NONE]'''

; <tt>--pad-flt</tt> <tt><double></tt> : Padding value '''[Default: disabled]'''

; <tt>--thresh-min-flt</tt> <tt><double></tt> : Minimum value truncation threshold '''[Default: disabled]'''

; <tt>--thresh-max-flt</tt> <tt><double></tt> : Maximum value truncation threshold '''[Default: disabled]'''

; <tt>--prune-histogram-flt</tt> <tt><integer></tt> : Number of bins for histogram-based pruning '''[Default: disabled]'''

; <tt>--histogram-equalization-flt</tt> : Apply histogram equalization

; <tt>--sobel-filter-flt</tt> : Apply Sobel edge detection filter

; <tt>--crop-index-flt</tt> <tt><string></tt> : Cropping region in pixel index coordinates [parsed as %d,%d,%d,%d,%d,%d for i0,j0,k0,i1,j1,k1] '''[Default value: NONE]'''

; <tt>--crop-world-flt</tt> <tt><string></tt> : Cropping region in world coordinates [parsed as %f,%f,%f,%f,%f,%f for x0,y0,z0,x1,y1,z1] '''[Default value: NONE]'''

=== Output parameters ===

; <tt>--outlist</tt> <tt><string></tt> / <tt>-o</tt> <tt><string></tt> : Output path for final transformation '''[Default value: NONE]'''

; <tt>--out-matrix</tt> <tt><string></tt> : Output path for final transformation in matrix format '''[Default value: NONE]'''

; <tt>--out-parameters</tt> <tt><string></tt> : Output path for final transformation in plain parameter list format '''[Default value: NONE]'''

; <tt>--protocol</tt> <tt><string></tt> / <tt>-p</tt> <tt><string></tt> : Optimization protocol output file name '''[Default value: NONE]'''

; <tt>--time</tt> <tt><string></tt> / <tt>-t</tt> <tt><string></tt> : Computation time statistics output file name '''[Default value: NONE]'''

=== Import Results into Slicer ===

; <tt>--out-itk</tt> <tt><transformation-path></tt> : Output path for final transformation in ITK format '''[Default value: NONE]'''

; <tt>--write-reformatted</tt> <tt><image-path></tt> : Write reformatted floating image. '''[Default value: NONE]'''

=== Image/Transformation Database ===

; <tt>--db</tt> <tt><string></tt> : Path to image/transformation database that should be updated with the new registration and/or reformatted image. '''[Default value: NONE]'''
